attribute-directive.greeting: Hey {{name}}, this is another way to use translations.
attribute-directive.title: Attribute Directive

icu.pluralization: You have {count, plural, =0 {no apples} one {one apple} other {# apples}}
icu.select: I like {flavor, select, vanilla {vanilla}  strawberry {strawberry} other {all}} ice cream.
icu.title: Formatting messages using ICU Syntax

scoped.text: With scopes, you can use shorter IDs in the templates.
